Gold.en: A ground attack with random power.

Silver.en: A ground attack with random power.

Crystal.en: A ground attack with random power.

Ruby.en: A ground-shaking attack of random intensity.
Ruby.de: Ein erdbebenartiger Angriff von zufälliger Stärke.

FireRed.en: A ground-shaking attack against all standing POKéMON. Its power varies.
